=== Tony Espy ===

I live in Somerville, Massachusetts ( near Boston ). I work for Canonical's OEM Services group.  My areas of expertise include communications software / networking, Wi-Fi, and audio software.  I also like to play guitar, sing, and write songs.  Oh yea, and I like to wear cowboy hats!
